alert.note: Alert for Buncombe; Graham; Haywood; Macon; Madison; Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson; Swain; Transylvania (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 6:14AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Macon, southwestern Transylvania, Jackson, Madison, Swain, Graham, Haywood and western Buncombe Counties through 700 AM EDT... At 614 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles east of Gatlinburg to 3 miles north of Hiawassee. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Sylva, Waynesville, Bryson City, Marshall, Robbinsville, Cherokee, Canton, Cullowhee and Lake Junaluska. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Buncombe; Graham; Haywood; Macon; Madison; Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson; Swain; Transylvania
